attributes.action: Not lower the voting age and keep it at 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wanted to vote when I was 16 but couldn't. I think the situation should remain this way. Also I don't feel some 16 year olds are mature enough to take on such responsiblity. Besides most 16 year olds I know don't care about politics and wouldn't bother to vote anyway
